actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend chapter 61 of title 18, United States Code, to permit the transportation, mailing, and broadcasting of advertising and other information concerning a bingo game authorized by and licensed under State law.

summary.text: Authorizes the transportation, mailing, and broadcasting of advertising and other information concerning a bingo game authorized by and licensed under State law. Defines the term "bingo" for purposes of this Act. (Amends 18 U.S.C. 1308, 39 U.S.C. 3005)

titles.title: A bill to amend chapter 61 of title 18, United States Code, to permit the transportation, mailing, and broadcasting of advertising and other information concerning a bingo game authorized by and licensed under State law.
